20110107042649.000|20110107042651.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20110107042651.000|20110107042651.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20110107042651.000|20110107042653.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20110107042653.000|20110107042655.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20110107042655.000|20110107042655.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20110107042655.000|20110107042657.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20110107042657.000|20110107042657.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20110107042657.000|20110107042659.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20110107042659.000|20110107042659.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta   
20110107042659.000|20110107042702.000|CC1|        is right for you.
